U

UltrasonicLocalisationData - Class in ca.mcgill.ecse211.capturetheflag
The UltrasonoicLocationData class is used to process date from the ultrasonic poller to detect edges
UltrasonicLocalisationData() - Constructor for class ca.mcgill.ecse211.capturetheflag.UltrasonicLocalisationData
Constructs an UltrasonicLocalisationData object.
UltrasonicNavigationData - Class in ca.mcgill.ecse211.capturetheflag
The UltrasonicNavigationData class processes the data coming from an ultrasonic sensor while the robot is navigating in oder to avoid obstacles
UltrasonicNavigationData(EV3LargeRegulatedMotor, EV3LargeRegulatedMotor, double, double) - Constructor for class ca.mcgill.ecse211.capturetheflag.UltrasonicNavigationData
Creates an instance of the UltrasonicNavigationData class.
UltrasonicPoller - Class in ca.mcgill.ecse211.capturetheflag
The UltrasonicPoller class has a reference of one ultrasonic poller and polls data periodically once its thread is started and stops when it is indicated to by terminating itself.
UltrasonicPoller(SampleProvider, float[], UltrasonicLocalisationData, UltrasonicNavigationData) - Constructor for class ca.mcgill.ecse211.capturetheflag.UltrasonicPoller
Creates an instance of the UltrasonicPoller class.
UltrasonicPoller.UltrasonicPollingState - Enum in ca.mcgill.ecse211.capturetheflag
This enumeration indicates the different states in which the UltrasonicPoller can be in.
usLocalisation() - Method in class ca.mcgill.ecse211.capturetheflag.Localisation
Performs the ultrasonic localisation routine assuming the robot's rotating center is on the 45° line in one of the four corners of the Game board.
